text: Edi Carlo Dias Marçal also known as Andradina (born 13 September 1974) is a Brazilian football manager and former player who played as a striker. He currently manages regional league side KP Piła. ==Club statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.League Cup J.League Cup Total Total 2000 Gamba Osaka J1 League 12 3 0 0 2 0 14 3 2000 Oita Trinita J2 League 17 9 3 4 0 0 20 13 2001 Albirex Niigata J2 League 18 6 0 0 0 0 18 6 2002 Oita Trinita J2 League 39 18 2 4 - 41 22 2003 J1 League 10 0 0 0 3 2 13 2 2003 Consadole Sapporo J2 League 22 6 3 2 0 0 25 8 Total Total Total 118 42 8 10 5 2 131 54 ==Honours== KP Piła * Klasa A Greater Poland I: 2020–21 Individual * Russian First Division top scorer: 1998 (27 goals) ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from São Paulo
title: Andradina (footballer)
